DOC.detailed_description: An open label , multi-centre , non-interventional post-marketing surveillance ( PMS ) monitor safety effectiveness Nebivolol administer Korean patient accord prescribe information Nebivolol administer Hypertension Chronic heart failure ( CHF ) patient describe prescribe information Nebivolol physician 's decision .
